Narrative:
You are standing on the stage, minutes away from your performance, as you wait in anticipation, you suddenly feel scared and panicked. This sensation is known as 'Stage Fright'. Have you ever felt such sensations?

In such situations, close your eyes. Breathing techniques will come in handy, try to relax yourself, remembering all the hard work you have done to reach where you are today. As you open your eyes, you are calm, ready to give your best.

Let us know if you have had such experiences with stage fright and how you overcame them.
Interest: Technology, History, Food, Entertainment, Sports, Environment, Science, Inequality, Education, Health, Politics, Economy, Climate change
Title: How did you get over your Stage frights?
